trend_summary: Satellite series shows steady infill within the central institutional campus: new large-roof buildings, parking decks and sports courts replace lawns and small lots. Peripheral single-family neighbourhoods remain largely intact, while riparian forest and golf-course greenery persist. Road grid unchanged except widened arterial at north. Overall built footprint grows moderately; tree canopy slightly thins near new blocks.
notable_changes: Multiple new academic/medical blocks erected in the campus core, replacing former parking and grass.
Construction of multi-storey parking structure visible east of main quad after mid-series.
Widening and realignment of northern arterial highway with added interchange ramps.
Small pockets of forest cleared south-east of river, balanced by later landscaping and sports-field turfing
